name: serverless-monorepo-yarn2
description: Sample monorepo style project using Yarn 2+
author: Nathan Simpson <nathanisaac@gmail.com>

scripts.create-service: cd packages/services && yarn exec sls create --template aws-nodejs-typescript --name
scripts.create-lib: cd packages/libs && yarn dlx tsdx create --template basic
scripts.create-component: cd packages/libs && yarn dlx tsdx create --template react
